name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Backend Engineer with extensive expertise in building robust **Node.js** and **Python** applications utilizing **FastAPI** for efficient back-end processes. Proven ability to design and implement **Microservices** architecture, develop scalable **APIs**, and leverage **AWS** for serverless computing solutions, ensuring high availability and performance. Adept at integrating **Databases** and optimizing **Data Synchronization** in **event-driven systems**. Recognized for driving automation initiatives that enhance software efficiency. Passionate about advancing technologies in **AI** and real estate applications, my background also includes delivering user-centric solutions across various sectors, including healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable **Node.js** microservices to enhance real estate technology applications, achieving an increase in response time by **50%**.
Designed and implemented **FastAPI** RESTful APIs for seamless data synchronization, reducing API response latency by **30%**.
Utilized **AWS** serverless solutions to automate resource management, resulting in a **20%** reduction in operational costs.
Optimized databases for high-performance data retrieval, improving query efficiency by **40%**.
Implemented event-driven systems to streamline processing workflows, reducing operational bottlenecks by **25%**.
Leveraged **Python** for data automation and analysis, increasing processing speed by **60%**.
Created comprehensive documentation and automated testing strategies to ensure software reliability and maintainability in line with best practices.

Utilized **Node.js** and **Python** to develop scalable backend services, enhancing API response times by **25%** for ticketing and customer support systems.
Implemented **FastAPI** to streamline microservices architecture, allowing for increased collaboration and efficiency in development timelines.
Designed and built serverless event-driven systems using AWS infrastructure and **AWS Lambda**, improving scalability and reducing server costs by **30%**.
Automated deployment processes with **AWS CodePipeline** and **Jenkins**, thus achieving an uninterrupted release cycle and a **50%** reduction in deployment errors.
Conducted data synchronization across multiple databases using **AWS RDS**, ensuring real-time data availability and integrity for critical applications.
Integrated **AI** functionalities into backend processes, enhancing machine learning capabilities for real estate technology.
Monitored performance metrics and improved system reliability, driving a **20%** increase in overall user satisfaction and engagement.

• Developed and maintained **APIs** using **Node.js** and **FastAPI**, ensuring seamless integration with various services and enhancing response_times by **30%**.
• Implemented microservices architecture, improving system scalability and maintainability in data synchronization processes.
• Leveraged **AWS** for deploying serverless applications, optimizing costs by **25%** and enhancing system performance.
• Collaborated with data teams to design databases that support real estate technology solutions, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage.
• Automated deployment processes using CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by **50%** and improving overall efficiency of project deliveries.
• Ensured event-driven systems were accurately implemented, facilitating real-time data processing and synchronization across platforms.

skills:
****Programming Languages****
	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

****Backend Frameworks****
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ, FastAPI

****Frontend Frameworks****
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

****API Technologies****
	RESTful API design, APIs

****Serverless and Cloud Functions****
	AWS Lambda, Serverless

****Databases****
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

****DevOps****
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, Automation

****Cloud & Infrastructure****
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

****Other****
	Microservices, Data Synchronization, Event-driven systems, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, AI, Real estate technology
